verses.text: \w The|strong="H5921"\w* fool says \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H1732"\w* heart, “There \w is|strong="H1732"\w* no God.” \w They|strong="H5921"\w* are corrupt; \w their|strong="H5921"\w* ways are vile. There \w is|strong="H1732"\w* no one who does good.

God looks \w down|strong="H7843"\w* \w from|strong="H3820"\w* heaven \w upon|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* sons \w of|strong="H3820"\w* \w men|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* see if \w any|strong="H6213"\w* understand, if \w any|strong="H6213"\w* seek God.

\w All|strong="H7200"\w* \w have|strong="H3426"\w* turned away, \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H3426"\w* \w together|strong="H5921"\w* \w become|strong="H7200"\w* corrupt;\f + \fr 53:3 \ft LXX worthless\f* \w there|strong="H3426"\w* \w is|strong="H3426"\w* \w no|strong="H7200"\w* \w one|strong="H1121"\w* \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w does|strong="H3426"\w* good, \w not|strong="H7200"\w* \w even|strong="H5921"\w* \w one|strong="H1121"\w*.\f + \fr 53:3 \ft Cited in Romans 3:10–12\f*

\w Will|strong="H1571"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w workers|strong="H6213"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* iniquity never learn? \w They|strong="H6213"\w* devour \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H1571"\w* \w like|strong="H3162"\w* bread; \w they|strong="H6213"\w* refuse \w to|strong="H6213"\w* call \w upon|strong="H6213"\w* God.

\w There|strong="H3045"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w*, overwhelmed \w with|strong="H3045"\w* dread, \w where|strong="H3808"\w* \w there|strong="H3045"\w* \w was|strong="H3808"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H7121"\w* fear. \w For|strong="H7121"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w has|strong="H3045"\w* \w scattered|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* bones \w of|strong="H5971"\w* those \w who|strong="H5971"\w* besieged \w you|strong="H3045"\w*. \w You|strong="H3045"\w* put \w them|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H7121"\w* shame, \w for|strong="H7121"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w has|strong="H3045"\w* despised \w them|strong="H7121"\w*.

Oh, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* salvation \w of|strong="H6106"\w* Israel would \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w from|strong="H1961"\w* Zion! \w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* restores \w His|strong="H1961"\w* captive \w people|strong="H3808"\w*,\f + \fr 53:6 \ft Or the fortunes of His people\f* \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H8033"\w* rejoice, \w let|strong="H3808"\w* Israel \w be|strong="H1961"\w* glad!
